ComicInfo.Title: Out of the Silent Planet
ComicInfo.Summary: Apparently the Oblivion War went very badly...we get to find out how bad through Lawrence's narration. He's an invalid now and must type on a keyboard using a stick. We're getting a little ahead though...it all started as a seemingly normal day for the Elementals. Tommy and Becky had a public nightmare as bother their restaurants held their grand opening right next to each other, on the same day! Next Morningstar shows up at the new HQ and announces she got married to Ambrose. Then they all attend the funeral for Porter Scott (still no body found however). They have a few drinks and just as they are walking back home...they are stopped by a woman who promptly assaults them with the aid of her friend "Floater". An extremely powerful telekinetic whom the Elementals can't even touch. The fight is over with disastrous results and just as the woman, Holocaust, stands gloating...Thor appears to continue the battle anew!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-14 13:30:42. [CVDB31949]
ComicInfo.Characters: Fathom, Floater, Holocaust, Lawrence Cartajel, Monolith, Morningstar, Thor, Vortex
